name: Federazione delle Imprese Agricole della Pesca e della Acquacoltura e Maricoltura delle imprese di trasformazione del settore ittico, agroalimentare e nei servizi e nelle attivit√† connesse
goal:
Agripesca promotes the development and the cooperation in the fishing, aquaculture and mariculture sectors in all its forms.

Agripesca interfaces with all institutions responsible for the protection and promotion of the marine environment and the fishing sector.
euInitiatives: Agripesca follows carefully main initiatives, policies and legislative files of European Parliament and European Commission
